medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset epigastric pain followed by diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely at approximately 12:30, with persistent and radiating pain to the back. The patient experienced several episodes of diarrhea, nausea, and 2 episodes of nonbloody, nonbilious vomiting. The pain has been constant.
medical_history.social_history: No alcohol use. No medication use.
